name: Polymorphweb
tagline: Polymorph game for Unity Web Player
body:
Polymorph
=========

Polymorph Game GGJ 2014
Adapting Polymorph Game (Oculus VR Game hosted at: github.com/Flux159/Polymorph) for Unity Web Player

Controls:

Mouse to change direction

WASD / Up-Down-Left-Right to move
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
